title: Smart Traffic Management
description: The system detects and recognizes vehicle license plates using ANPR and classifies different types of traffic with ATCC. By doing so, it aims to improve traffic flow, reduce congestion, and enhance road safety.

body.raw:
[![](/images/projects/smart-traffic-management.png)](coming soon)

This project leverages Deep Learning and Object Detection techniques to automate traffic monitoring and control. The system detects and recognizes vehicle license plates using ANPR (Automatic Number Plate Recognition) and classifies different types of traffic with ATCC (Automatic Traffic Condition Classification). By doing so, it aims to:

- Improve traffic flow
- Reduce congestion
- Enhance road safety
